算法描述+代码实现

public static int[] bubbleSort(int[] arrays) {

    for (int j = 0; j < arrays.length; j++) {
      // arrays.lenth -1  j+1 ݣ˵˳ѾźˣûбҪٴεѭ
      for (int i = arrays.length - 1; i > j; i--) {
        if (arrays[i] < arrays[i - 1]) {
          int temp = arrays[i - 1];
          arrays[i - 1] = arrays[i];
          arrays[i] = temp;
        }
      }
    }
    return arrays;
  }

  public static int[] bubbleSortImpove(int[] arrays) {

    boolean flag = false;
    for (int j = 0; j < arrays.length; j++) {
      if (flag)
        return arrays;
      flag = true;
      // arrays.lenth -1  j+1 ݣ˵˳ѾźˣûбҪٴεѭ
      for (int i = arrays.length - 1; i > j; i--) {
        if (arrays[i] < arrays[i - 1]) {
          int temp = arrays[i - 1];
          arrays[i - 1] = arrays[i];
          arrays[i] = temp;
          flag = false;
        }
      }
    }

    return arrays;
  }
